      • 1973-0715 Guru Pūjā (Hindi) (Guru Pūrṇimā), Sahaja Yoga is a New Discovery, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

      • 2006-1022 Talk of Sir C.P., Śhrī Mahālakṣhmī Pūjā (Diwālī Pāḍavā Day), Nirmal Nagarī, Nirmalā Devī Mārg, Gat No. 26, Bhukum (17 kms W of Pune), Maharashtra, India

      Shri Rajalakshmi Puja

      • 1996-1207 Śhrī Rājalakṣhmī Pūjā (Hindi), Bharat Scouts Ground and Guides Marg, Nizamuddin, National Zoological Park, Sundar Nagar, New Delhi, India

      Shri Rama Puja

      • 1982-0402 Śhrī Rāma Pūjā (Rāma Navamī Day), Āśhram, 44 Chelsham Road, Clapham, London, UK

      • 1998-0405 Śhrī Rāma Pūjā (Rāma Navamī), House, Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India

      Shri Shakambhari Puja

      • 2005-0114 Śhrī Śhākambharī Pūjā (Hindi), Pratiṣhṭhān, NDA Road, Warje, Pune, Maharashtra, India

      Shri Shakti Puja

      • 1997-1231 Śhrī Śhakti Pūjā (Hindi + English + Marathi), The Śhakti Within You Wants to Be Loving, Kind, and Generous, Kalwa, Thane, Maharashtra, India

      Shri Virata Puja

      • 1999-0905 Śhrī Virāṭa Pūjā, Hangar (now Nirmal Temple), Albera Ligure, Alessandria, Italy
